original_title: Universal Ike Junior in the Dangers of a Great City
overview: Ike, having produced the roll of money from the leg of Louise's father's trousers, rents a speedy automobile, and with Louise starts for the beach. Meanwhile, father, ma and the sheriff, having extricated themselves from the roof of the hotel, start out in mad pursuit.
title: Universal Ike Junior in the Dangers of a Great City
